summary: In 11th century Normandy, a Norman duke sends one of his knights to build a defensive fortress in order to guard the borders against Frisian raiders.
cast: Charlton Heston|Richard Boone|Rosemary Forsyth|Maurice Evans|Guy Stockwell|Niall MacGinnis|James Farentino|Henry Wilcoxon|Sammy Ross|Woodrow Parfrey|John Alderson|Allen Jaffe|Michael Conrad|Dal Jenkins|Johnny Jensen|Forrest Wood|Belle Mitchell|Paul Frees|Kent McCord|William O'Connell
director: Director: Franklin J. Schaffner (as Franklin Schaffner)
